name: A Light Puzzle Game
description:
Learn the aspects of color and light!

Learn to solve a few puzzles that require you to think using light and colors and observe their changes! 

You will be moving both the sources of light and the objects within. Manipulate what you see and let it open the doors for you...

Are you up for the challenge?

Controls:

Movement is done through the WASD or ZQSD keys.

You can run a little faster using the SHIFT key

Interact with objects using the E key

And finally you can press the P key to restart the most recent zone
